title: Turkey Red w/no ad back for sale

posts.post_title: Turkey Red w/no ad back for sale
posts.post_content:
Turkey Red Devlin with no ad back.  Won this in REA, but it doesn’t really fit in with my collection.  $300 delivered, net to me.  That is my break even price.

Scans at [url]www.imageevent.com/drumback/forsale[/url]
